project_info: Built a real-time system to detect red-light violations using YOLOv8 and SORT tracking. Integrated a custom traffic light classifier and a Gradio dashboard to visualize violations and generate e-challans.
Developed a food delivery and reservation app using Flutter and Firebase. Included user-friendly dashboards, online reservation and data handling for both customers and restaurant owners.
Created a console-based Shogi game in C++ using OOP principles like inheritance and polymorphism. Features include game reload/restart and custom rules inspired by the original Japanese version.
